Class TradingHours

Namespace
FinSysPlatform.Domain.Market
Assembly
FinSysPlatform.Domain.Market.dll

Represents the Trading Hours information. Usually, trading hours relate to the Instrument. Trading hours are defined by the exchange (Exchange) 

[PublicAPI]
public class TradingHours : ITimeZoneProvider, INameProvider

A collection of session definitions of the configured Trading Hours template.

Holidays

A collection of full holidays configured for a Trading Hours template. Holidays are days which fall outside of the regular trading schedule.

public IReadOnlyList<Holiday> Holidays { get; }

Property Value

Remarks

Actually, empty trading hours does not make any sense. This is considered as an invalid configuration
